description: <span style="font-family: Helvetica; ">UMD 2.2.2 is a revision of &nbsp;UMD 2.2.0 (Unified Middleware&nbsp;</span><span style="font-family: Helvetica; ">Distribution) release made available for the EGI production&nbsp;</span><span style="font-family: Helvetica; ">infrastructure.&nbsp;</span>
releaseNotes: <span style="font-family: Helvetica; ">This release contains the following products:</span><br style="font-family: Helvetica; "><span style="font-family: Helvetica; "><b>EMI Technology Provider:</b></span><br style="font-family: Helvetica; "><ul><li><span style="font-family: Helvetica; ">dcache-srmclient v2.2.4-2, released in SL5 and SL6</span>,&nbsp;<span style="font-family: Helvetica; ">This release solves a security vulnerability (<a href="https://wiki.egi.eu/wiki/SVG:Advisory-SVG-2012-4600">SVG-2012-4600</a>)&nbsp;affecting EMI-WN&nbsp;</span><span style="font-family: Helvetica; ">2.0.0 and EMI-UI 2.0.0 released in UMD 2.1</span></li></ul>
installationNotes: <span style="font-family: Helvetica; ">To apply the patch, please run '# yum update dcache-srmclient' in the&nbsp;</span><span style="font-family: Helvetica; ">following installations:</span><br style="font-family: Helvetica; "><ul><li><span style="font-family: Helvetica; ">EMI-WN from UMD-2</span><br></li><li><span style="font-family: Helvetica; ">EMI-UI &nbsp;from UMD-2</span></li></ul>
contact: For further information about the UMD, its goals and surrounding processes, and more information about how to engage as a Technology Provider with EGI, please send an Email to: cto (at) egi.eu.
technicalContact: <span style="font-family: Helvetica; ">For any bugs and issues you encounter that are not described in the&nbsp;</span><span style="font-family: Helvetica; ">release notes of this UMD release, or the related documentation&nbsp;</span><span style="font-family: Helvetica; ">provided by the Technology Providers, please visit the <a href="http://ggus.eu">EGI Helpdesk </a>to&nbsp;</span><span style="font-family: Helvetica; ">make a report.</span>
knownIssues: <span style="font-family: Helvetica; ">Details containing known issues and workarounds found in EGI&nbsp;</span><span style="font-family: Helvetica; ">verification and staged rollout are collected&nbsp;</span><span style="font-family: Helvetica; ">in <a href="https://wiki.egi.eu/wiki/UMD-2:UMD-2.2.2">https://</a></span><font face="Helvetica"><a href="https://wiki.egi.eu/wiki/UMD-2:UMD-2.2.2">wiki.egi.eu/wiki/UMD-2:UMD-2.2.2</a></font>
changeLog: <span style="font-family: Helvetica; ">This release solves a security vulnerability identified in the&nbsp;</span><span style="font-family: Helvetica; ">dcache-srmclient package. &nbsp;</span><span style="font-family: Helvetica; ">Affected components: <b>EMI-WN, EMI-UI</b></span>

products.name: emi.dcache-srmclient
products.releaseNotes: This release is meant to address a vulnerability in the dcache-srmclient, assessed by SVG: Advisory-SVG-2012-4600
products.changeLog: This release is meant to address a vulnerability in the dcache-srmclient, assessed by SVG: Advisory-SVG-2012-4600
